name: Yuusha's Grinding Quest
description:
Grinding games for people who want to kill time and like progress, focus on satisfaction. Currently, there are 2 class (Knight and Mage) with different gameplay styles and skillsets, 4 Weapon upgrades,  3 skills for each class, and 3 maps that will unlock as you progress. Planning on making more class, area, and new content to play with in the future! This project is very early in development so if you find a problem or have suggestions about game content please let me know. Thank you!

===========================================================

Control

A - Left

D - Right

Spacebar - Jump

Left Click - Attack

Right Click - Skill1

R - Skill2

Shift - Skill3

E - Interact

===========================================================

K - Save game 

L - Load game

(I will find a better way to save and load in the future)
